key.name: app-close-type
key.summary: What to do when app is closed.
key.description: When one Alt+Tab to an app and close it, there are some sensible behaviors: 'close-all-windows' (default) - close all windows of the selected app; 'close-all-windows-in-current-workspace' - close all windows of the selected app in the current workspace; 'close-most-recently-used-window' - close only the most recently used window of the selected app. This setting does not affect the behavior of closing a window (Alt+'Key above Tab').
